mapper.sql: nannyId, nannyAvatar, nannyName, nannySex, nannyStatus, nannyType, nannyLevel, nannyPhone, provinceId, cityId, areaId, streetId, nannyAddress, nannyIdCard, nannyBirthday, nannyAge, nannyAnimalSign, nannyNation,nannyOrigin, nannyHeight, nannyWeight, salaryBank, salaryCard, expectSalary, nannyBuyoutStatus, nannyBuyoutDate, nannyAgencyFees, payment, validDate, remark, createTime, modifyTime, isDel
mapper.select: SELECT j.nannyId,j.nannyAvatar,j.createTime,j.nannyName,j.nannyIdCard,j.nannyPhone,j.nannyAge,j.nannySex,d1.INFO AS nannySexInfo, j.provinceId,d2.provinceName AS provinceIdInfo,j.cityId,d3.cityName AS cityIdInfo,j.areaId,d4.areaName AS areaIdInfo,j.streetId,d5.streetName AS streetIdInfo,j.nannyAddress,j.remark FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.nannySex LEFT JOIN j_province d2 ON d2.provinceId = j.provinceId LEFT JOIN j_city d3 ON d3.cityId = j.cityId LEFT JOIN j_area d4 ON d4.areaId = j.areaId LEFT JOIN j_street d5 ON d5.streetId = j.streetId WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}

SELECT j.nannyId,j.nannyStatus,d1.INFO AS nannyStatusInfo,j.nannyLevel,d2.INFO AS nannyLevelInfo,j.nannyAgencyFees,j.payment,d3.INFO AS paymentInfo, j.expectSalary,j.validDate,j.salaryCard,j.salaryBank,j.hot,d4.INFO AS hotInfo FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.nannyStatus LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = j.nannyLevel LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID = j.payment LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID = j.hot WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}

SELECT j.nannyHeight,j.nannyWeight,j.nannyOrigin,d1.provinceName AS nannyOriginInfo,j.nannyNation,d2.INFO AS nannyNationInfo,j.nannyAnimalSign,d3.INFO AS nannyAnimalSignInfo,j.nannyEducation,d4.INFO AS nannyEducationInfo FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_province d1 ON d1.provinceId = j.nannyOrigin LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = j.nannyNation LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID = j.nannyAnimalSign LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID = j.nannyEducation WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}
SELECT j.nannyShopId,d1.shopName AS shopName,j.nannyId FROM j_nanny_shop j LEFT JOIN j_shop d1 ON d1.shopId= j.shopId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyTrainId,d1.trainName AS trainIdInfo FROM j_nanny_train j LEFT JOIN j_train d1 ON d1.trainId= j.trainId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyJobLevelId,d1.INFO AS jobLevelIdInfo FROM j_nanny_job_level j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.jobLevelId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyReligId,d1.INFO AS religionIdInfo FROM j_nanny_religion j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.religionId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyCertId,d1.INFO AS certificateIdInfo,j.photo FROM j_nanny_certificate j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.certificateId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyLangId,d1.INFO AS languageIdInfo FROM j_nanny_language j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.languageId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannyChaId,d1.INFO AS characterIdInfo FROM j_nanny_character j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.characterId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}
SELECT j.nannySkillId,d1.INFO AS skillIdInfo FROM j_nanny_skill j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID= j.skillId WHERE j.nannyId=#{0}

SELECT jni.nannyId,jni.nannyName,jni.nannyPhone,jdi.INFO AS nannyUnitPrice FROM j_nanny_info jni LEFT JOIN j_dict_info jdi ON jdi.ID=jni.nannyLevel LEFT JOIN j_nanny_job_level jnjl ON jnjl.nannyId = jni.nannyId LEFT JOIN j_nanny_job_level_goods jnjlg ON jnjlg.jobLevelId=jnjl.jobLevelId LEFT JOIN j_order_temp jot ON jot.goodsId = jnjlg.goodsId WHERE jot.orderId=#{0} AND jni.nannyName LIKE concat(concat('%',#{1}),'%') GROUP BY jni.nannyId
